DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two different vitro fertilization ( IVF ) treatment : conventional IVF protocol minimal stimulation IVF protocol , term success rate , stress treatment , drug-related side effect , multiple pregnancy cost treatment .
DOC.brief_title: IVF Clinical Trial Two Different Treatment Protocols .
DOC.detailed_description: A random population 564 sub-fertile woman couple female age 18 38 year desire undergo first IVF cycle include outpatient clinical trial . The participation study approximately six month total 20 25 visit . After successful completion pre-screening test participant randomize one two arm study : Arm A - mini IVF protocol , Arm B - conventional IVF protocol .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Valid indication IVF treatment First IVF attempt Female age 18 38 year Male partner 18 year age old Both partner STD free Must able understand may NOT become pregnant Exclusion criterion : Not willing able sign consent form Preexisting medical condition preventing/interfering IVF treatment Abnormal IVF screen test , include Complete Blood Count , Varicella titer , Rubella titer , PAP smear , Syphilis , HIV 1 & 2 , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , Chlamydia , Gonorrhea Abnormal pap smear Body Mass Index ( BMI ) fall 18.5 32.0 Female participant irregular menstrual cycle
